doc.title: Papatya ile karabiber
doc.plot: Papatya is a beautiful young girl with a fabulous voice. She is a great dancer, as well.. Karabiber works in her father Mahmut's orchestra as a clarinet player. They are in love since childhood and expected to get married. The only problem is Omer who is very jealous of them, always following and bothering Papatya. Burhan Bey sees Papatya on the stage offers her a job at his exquisite night club. He has one condition and that is Papatya's staying single for a certain period. Papatya and Karabiber agree to this offer. Papatya becomes a star. Burhan fancies Papatya and tries to get Karabiber away from her. But although she is very rich and famous, Papatya is unhappy because she misses Karabiber a lot and decides to return back to Karabiber.. But things have changed and nobody knows how all will end.
